description.zh: HedgeDoc 是一个支持实时协作的 Markdown 笔记平台，灵感来源于 Hackpad 和 Etherpad。它允许多名用户同时编辑笔记，并支持多种部署方式，包括 Docker、Heroku 和手动安装。该项目最初由 HackMD 开发，现已发展为社区驱动的开源项目。
description.en: HedgeDoc is a real-time collaborative markdown note-taking platform inspired by Hackpad and Etherpad. It allows multiple users to edit notes simultaneously and supports deployment via various methods including Docker, Heroku, and manual setup. Originally developed by HackMD, it has evolved into a community-driven open-source project.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 支持多人实时协作编辑 Markdown 笔记。
- 提供灵活的部署方式，适配不同环境。
- 活跃的社区支持，持续开发与贡献。

## 功能列表:

- 实时协作编辑功能
- 多种部署方式（支持 Docker、Cloudron、Heroku、LinuxServer.io 及手动安装）
- 支持通过 Facebook、GitHub、GitLab、Google、OAuth2、LDAP 等登录
- 图片与文件存储支持 Imgur、S3、MinIO、Dropbox 及本地存储
- 通过 Dropbox 实现笔记导入导出
- 兼容主流现代浏览器
- 支持对自托管实例进行备份与恢复
- 提供命令行工具（hedgedoc-cli），便于终端使用
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Enables seamless real-time collaboration on markdown notes.
- Offers flexible deployment options for different environments.
- Strong community support with active development and contributions.

## Features:

- Real-time collaborative editing
- Multiple deployment methods (Docker, Cloudron, Heroku, LinuxServer.io, manual setup)
- Login integration with Facebook, GitHub, GitLab, Google, OAuth2, LDAP, and more
- Support for image and file storage via Imgur, S3, MinIO, Dropbox, and local storage
- Export and import via Dropbox
- Browser compatibility with major modern browsers
- Backup and restore functionality for self-hosted instances
- Command-line tool (hedgedoc-cli) for terminal-based usage
